Package entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, EnemyShip, Ship
public class Entity
extends Object
Implements a generic game entity.
Author:
Roberto Izquierdo Amo 위치, 색깔 조정

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Entity​(int positionX, int positionY, int width, int height, Color color)
    Constructor, establishes the entity's generic properties.

    Getter for the color of the entity.

    Getter for the height of the image associated to the entity.

    Getter for the Y axis position of the entity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity​(int positionX, int positionY, int width, int height, Color color)
      Constructor, establishes the entity's generic properties.
      Parameters:
      positionX - Initial position of the entity in the X axis.
      positionY - Initial position of the entity in the Y axis.
      width - Width of the entity.
      height - Height of the entity.
      color - Color of the entity.

  • Method Details

    • getColor

      public final Color getColor()
      Getter for the color of the entity.
      Returns:
      Color of the entity, used when drawing it.

    • getPositionX

      public final int getPositionX()
      Getter for the X axis position of the entity.
      Returns:
      Position of the entity in the X axis.

    • getPositionY

      public final int getPositionY()
      Getter for the Y axis position of the entity.
      Returns:
      Position of the entity in the Y axis.

    • setPositionX

      public final void setPositionX​(int positionX)
      Setter for the X axis position of the entity.
      Parameters:
      positionX - New position of the entity in the X axis.

    • setPositionY

      public final void setPositionY​(int positionY)
      Setter for the Y axis position of the entity.
      Parameters:
      positionY - New position of the entity in the Y axis.

    • getSpriteType

      public final DrawManager.SpriteType getSpriteType()
      Getter for the sprite that the entity will be drawn as.
      Returns:
      Sprite corresponding to the entity.

    • getWidth

      public final int getWidth()
      Getter for the width of the image associated to the entity.
      Returns:
      Width of the entity.

    • getHeight

      public final int getHeight()
      Getter for the height of the image associated to the entity.
      Returns:
      Height of the entity.
